items.sentence: Both of Tom's brothers are older than he is.
I'm going to be thirty years old in October.
Things didn't turn out the way Tom expected.
Do you think you'll be in Boston all summer?
You're not the one who bought this, are you?
Tom likes talking to strangers, but I don't.
You're going to have to spell it out for me.
Tom needs to learn how to control his anger.
Don't think you can escape the consequences.
I wish I could give you everything you want.
Would it be OK if I stayed here for a while?
Please tell Tom that he has to do that soon.
Tom had to interview for that job in French.
All the songs we plan to sing are in French.
Tom needs to continue doing what he's doing.
Tom needs to know what we're planning to do.
Tom did well in every subject except French.
I thought that you knew how to speak French.
I don't see anything wrong with that at all.
You shouldn't use someone else's toothbrush.
